Articles.Content:
Hey guys.

I'm using stock version of KSP 1.2 and almost (not always) every time im starting the game the starting screen looks the following: http://imgur.com/vQ2lxN1 http://imgur.com/PVhBqug

Some parts in game also missing textures.

I tried reinstalling, deleting game folder and verifying game integrity and reloading database in Debug console but the problem persists.. 

 

Edit: Well i think it might have been solved. I was still running force open gl launch command.. If it appears to be recurring i will revive the topic.

Edited November 18, 2016 by Grengo
solved
